sn50.55-66:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ganga nadi pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara;
sn50.55-66:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu panca balani bhavento panca balani bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
sn50.55-66:1.3: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu panca balani bhavento panca balani bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo?
sn50.55-66:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu, saddhabalam bhaveti ragavinayapariyosanam dosavinayapariyosanam mohavinayapariyosanam …
sn50.55-66:1.5: evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu panca balani bhavento panca balani bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo”ti.
